footwork.translation[0].definitions[0].d: skilful use of your feet when dancing or playing a sport
footwork.translation[0].definitions[0].e: The England keeper revealed some fancy footwork in the victory over Nottingham Forest.
footwork.translation[0].definitions[1].d: skilful methods that you use to achieve something
footwork.translation[0].definitions[1].e: It took a bit of deft footwork to get them to agree.
